entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 01:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: W 50 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight then west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
